element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm generates a new layer in which the value of each cell represents the number of times that this cell has a given value in a set of raster layer

element.name: NODATA
element.text: If this option is selected, the presence of a cell with no data value will cancel the calculation and assign the no-data value to the resulting cell . If this is not selected, cells with no data value will be ignored and the resulting value will be based only on valid data cells.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The value of the cells in this layer represents the number of cells of the input layers that have exactly the same as the given value.
